Westpac Chopper Appeal raised over $15,000 for Eastland Rescue Helicopter https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/09/26/westpac-chopper-appeal-raised-over-15000-for-eastland-rescue-helicopter/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/09/26/westpac-chopper-appeal-raised-over-15000-for-eastland-rescue-helicopter/ Amount shows 'generosity of New Zealanders and how much we all value our chopper crews' Wed, 25 Sep 2024 17:09:00 +0000 In an early callout to the East Coast, the Trust Tairawhiti Eastland Rescue Helicopter was dispatched to Ruatōria in the early hours of last Wednesday morning.
